metadata.title: CVE-2019-18611 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the CheckUser extension through 1.34 forMediaWiki. Certain sensitive information within oversighted edit summariesmade available via the MediaWiki API was potentially visible to users withvarious levels of access to this extension. Said users should not have beenable to view these oversighted edit summaries via the MediaWiki API.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
